hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Comité Départemental du Tourisme du Gers en Gascogne

schema:streetAddress: 51, Avenue des Thermes - Barbotan les Thermes

de:
Das Hotel-Restaurant Cante Grit befindet sich im Herzen des Kurortes Barbotan-les-Thermes im Norden des Departements Gers.

Nur 150 m von den Thermalbädern entfernt wird hier mit saisonalen Produkten gekocht.
Schlankheitspaket
Familiäre Atmosphäre
en:
The hotel restaurant is located in the heart of the thermal station of Barbptan-les-Thermes.
Located 100 meters from the thermal baths, this establishment proposes you 20 individualized bedrooms and proposes you the full-board (breakfast, lunch and dinner), the half-board (breakfast and lunch or dinner), or just the bedroom with the breakfast.

Open periods:
From 14, March to 30, November, 2016
Every day

General:
Activities nearby: bathing, open swimming pool, museum, shops, spa, casino, beach, boules pitch
Facilities & services:

Services: Room service, pets are accepted, meeting, information, cloakroom, aerial bookings, tours’ bookings, half-board, shows’ booking
Equipments: garden, car park, park, toilets, library, bar, terrace, coach park
Comforts: television, internet access, hairdryer, direct phone, canal+, Wi-Fi, telecopy

Prices:

21 days full-board for 2 persons: 2450€ / 3150€
Price per room for 2 persons: 59€ / 82€
21 days half-board for 1 person: 1375e / 1615€
21 days full-board for 1 person: 1495€ / 1765€
21 days half-board for 2 persons: 2125€ / 2250€
Price per room for 1 person: 49€ / 72€
it:
L'hotel-ristorante Cante Grit si trova nel cuore della città termale di Barbotan-les-Thermes, nel Gers settentrionale.

A soli 150 m dalle terme, cucina preparata con prodotti di stagione.
Pacchetto dimagrante
Atmosfera familiare
fr:
L'hôtel-restaurant Cante Grit est localisé en plein coeur de la station thermale de Barbotan-les-Thermes, dans le nord du Gers.

A seulement 150m des thermes, cuisine élaborée avec des produits de saison.
Forfait minceur
Ambiance familiale
nl:
Het hotel-restaurant Cante Grit ligt in het hart van het kuuroord Barbotan-les-Thermes, in het noorden van de Gers.

Op slechts 150m van de thermen, keuken bereid met seizoensproducten.
Afslankingspakket
Familiale sfeer
es:
El hotel-restaurante Cante Grit está situado en el corazón de la ciudad balneario de Barbotan-les-Thermes, en el norte de Gers.

A sólo 150 m de los baños termales, cocina elaborada con productos de temporada.
Paquete de adelgazamiento
Ambiente familiar
